sessionList.title: Touch Input
sessionList.longDescription: Touch with one finger or two fingers, and learn gestures
sessionList.comment: Tap on the lesson title to read its description

sessionList.title: Your Phone
sessionList.comment: You can redo exercises that have a checkmark next to them

sessionList.title: Notifications
sessionList.longDescription: Stay updated with new information from notifications
sessionList.comment: Your plant has grown so much, keep learning to grow it fully!

sessionList.title: Quick Settings
sessionList.description: Access your Quick Settings with a swipe gesture
sessionList.longDescription: Customize your Quick Settings for frequently used settings
sessionList.comment: You have learnt so much already in these lessons!

sessionList.title: Navigation
sessionList.longDescription: Navigate between apps and system screens easily with touch gestures
sessionList.comment: Take a look at your plant collection to see all of your plants

sessionList.title: Widgets
sessionList.longDescription: Learn to add widgets to your phone's Home Screen
sessionList.comment: You have made a good start in your learning journey!

sessionList.title: Permissions
sessionList.longDescription: Learn about how you can control an app's access to your phone and its data
sessionList.comment: I am working hard to bring you more lessons, stay tuned!
